name: Gary the Adventurer
description:
We did this project for the Retro Jam 2021.

We remastered the game pitfall for SNES. And we used the optional theme SIDE-EFFECTS. 

The side effects we used are: when you get bitten by a snake, you get poisoned, which results in losing score. When you touch the camp fire, you start burning, which also results in losing score. When you get hit by a barrel you start hobbling.

This project was made in a week by a group of 4 people:

- Marcos Engelhard: Programmer; https://marcos-engelhard.itch.io/

- Ricardo Oliveira: Game Designer, Level Designer and Sound Designer;

- Francisco Silva: Pixel artist (assets and level); 

- Jenifer Lagoaça: Pixel artist (main character and animals); https://itch.io/profile/jeniwg;

Controls: 

 - Movement: AD;

 - Climb up: W;

 - Climb down: S;

 - Jump: Space;
